Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

validation.validation: The total amount of the Payments entered must equal the Control Total Amount.
A deposit with a status of approved is not editable.
This payment is already associated with a deposit. You can only deposit a payment that is associated with another deposit if the previous deposit is canceled or denied.
All payments must have a student payment source that is tied to the company for this deposit.
One or more payments don't match the deposit type. Change the deposit type or deposit different payments.
One of the payments has a payment type that is not valid for the submitted deposit type. Remove the payment.
One of the payments has an amount of 0 USD. Payment amounts must be greater than 0 USD. Remove the payment.
You can't deposit student sponsor payments that are canceled. Remove the payments that have a status of Canceled.
One or more payments are associated with a business process that isn't successfully completed. If the event is still in progress, approve the payment. Otherwise, remove the payment.
One or more payments have an adjustment in progress. Complete the adjustments before depositing the payments.
Apply the student sponsor payment before you deposit it.
One or more payments don't match the deposit type. Change the deposit type or deposit different payments.
One or more payments are not approved.
